mapper.insert: insert into tbl_noodle (name, brand, thumbnail, weight, soupColor, releaseDate, noodleType, type) values(#{name},#{brand},#{thumbnail},#{weight},#{soupColor},#{releaseDate},#{noodleType},#{type})
mapper.select: select name, brand, thumbnail, weight, soupColor, releaseDate, noodleType,type from tbl_noodle where name = #{name}
